pullRequest.title: [#1187] Ability to configure all the SqlStatements used by JdbcEventStorageEngine
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds the ability to configure all the SqlStatements used by JdbcEventStoreEngine while preserving the default as before.
I've also added/updated javadocs on classes I touched.
This PR resolves #1187.

commit.message: Added the ability to configure all the SqlStatements used by JdbcEventStorageEngine
